Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can show a string telephone connecting two students to communicate.
The student can illustrate how the string can carry sound to allow communication over a distance.
The student can depict tools or materials used to create the string telephone.
The student can visually explain how the device solves the problem of communicating over long distances.
The student can include labels or notes explaining how sound travels through the string.
The student can represent how communication over distances is aided by the device in their drawing.
